welcome_message_body: Welcome to Grantsville, USA! Known for its charming small-town feel and rich history, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay here.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Salt Lake City International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Salt Lake City International Airport, primarily serving regional and low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Salt Lake City International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
